text:
The Pakistan government should explain on what grounds actor Anupam Kher was denied a visa to travel to that country, the BJP on Wednesday said while noting that India has been “liberal” in granting visas to Pakistani artists.

Exchange of artists helps promote peace and improves ties among people, party secretary Shrikant Sharma said.

BJP also questioned the silence of ‘intellectuals’ active in the intolerance debate “after being so vocal in the past.”

Earlier, Pakistan High Commissioner Abdul Basit called up Mr. Kher and offered him a visa but the actor declined the offer, saying he has already taken up other assignments on the scheduled dates. — PTI
title: Pak. should explain why Kher was denied visa: BJP
